about_the_game:
This DLC doesn't add any playable content, only 5 new original soundtracks made by my friend and musician Anthony Mikhailovsky.

I am against DLCs that add content which should be in the base game. I am making a WWII wargame, all content will be there, in the base game.

This DLC is meant for people who just want new tracks to listen to, but mostly for those who proposed to support me, who asked if I had a patreon or that kind of thing (which I don't).

This money will be used to either buy myself a coffee or fund the multiplayer servers.
